name: Monster Crush Mania
description:
Welcome to the World of Monsters. Get ready for a colorful journey. Swipe monsters by matching 3, solve puzzles and help monsters pass their fun challenges.

Start playing Monster Crush today - A match 3 game where you will reach the peak of fun.

There are tons of funful puzzles. Swipe and match monsters of the same color in combinations of 3 or more, make wisely and forward-thinking moves, blast monsters with powerful boosters and win! Experience the excitement of reaching more challenges.

Earn more rewards by playing every day, more crush means more rewards and don't forget to spin the wheel and get your rewards.

HOW TO PLAY
• Swipe and match 3 or more monsters.
• Collect the monsters to complete each level!
• Crush colorful and powerful boosters to help you out!
• Enjoy other various missions, like catching the frog, flying the propeller and putting out the fire.
• Achieve 3 stars to get more coins and rewards.

Monster Crush Mania features:

MATCH 3 MONSTER PUZZLE
- Colorful and vivid monsters.
- A crazy matching puzzle game with cute characters & addictive levels!

EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn, lots of fun.

MANY WAYS TO WIN REWARDS
- Check back daily and spin the Daily Booster Wheel to receive free rewards, and take part in time limited challenges to earn boosters to help you level up!

NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Play whenever you want, online and offline!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Savor the stunning graphics and animations.

TONS OF ENJOYABLE LEVELS
- Continuously increasing amount of levels with fun puzzles.

Monster Crush Mania is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like boosters and coins. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Enjoy the game on various devices (phones and tablets).

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet.

Download Monster Crush Mania and begin your magical journey today!
